trans-unit.source: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

trans-unit.source: The tastiest morsels rarely make it to their intended destination.
trans-unit.target: The tastiest morsels rarely make it to their intended destination.

trans-unit.source: [+1]: Draw a card, then add one mana of any color. [−2]: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. [−8]: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Draw a card, then add one mana of any color. [−2]: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. [−8]: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.source: Flying {2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: Flying {2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate only once each turn.

trans-unit.resname: PL24·6 | Korvold, Fae-Cursed King | Card Name
PL24·6 | Korvold, Fae-Cursed King | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever Korvold, Fae-Cursed King enters the battlefield or attacks, sacrifice another permanent. Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Korvold and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Flying Whenever Korvold, Fae-Cursed King enters the battlefield or attacks, sacrifice another permanent. Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Korvold and draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PL24·6 | Korvold, Fae-Cursed King | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Becoming a dragon only sharpened his raw ambitions.
trans-unit.target: Becoming a dragon only sharpened his raw ambitions.

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn. Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn. Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.
